shortdesc.ph: Occurs when the media push state changes.

p.codeblock: public void onRtmpStreamingStateChanged( String url, RTMP_STREAM_PUBLISH_STATE state, RTMP_STREAM_PUBLISH_ERROR errCode) {}
public virtual void OnRtmpStreamingStateChanged(string url, RTMP_STREAM_PUBLISH_STATE state, RTMP_STREAM_PUBLISH_ERROR errCode)

section.p: The SDK triggers this callback to report the result of the local user calling the or method. 旁路推流状态发生改变时，SDK 会触发该回调，并在回调中明确状态发生改变的 URL 地址及当前推流状态。 This callback indicates the state of the RTMP or RTMPS streaming. When exceptions occur, you can troubleshoot issues by referring to the detailed error descriptions in the error code parameter.

plentry.pd: The RTMP or RTMPS streaming state, see . 当推流状态为 (4) 时，你可以在 errorCode 参数中查看返回的错误信息。
The detailed error information for streaming, see .
